Side Effects: Amazing! I had to ask my GP for it since it's a new ATB and everything else makes me sick. I've been through z-pak_ Levaqin_ Cipro etc. all of which had horrible side effects but not Duricef. No anxiety or crying spells either.
Comments: It took a while to kill the bacteria but I actually felt better the first night after taking 1 gram. I went from feeling very sick to getting my appetite back in one day.
